TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmPropertyAttribute

summary.span: 一个属性 (Attribute)，指示属性 (property) 表示导航属性 (property)。

span.span: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a navigation property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将类的导航属性链接到概念性模型中定义的实体类型的导航属性。The links the navigation property of a class to the navigation property of an entity type that is defined in the conceptual model. 此属性 (Attribute) 适用于下列类型的导航属性 (Property)：This attribute is applied to the following types of navigation properties: - 返回的属性的相关对象。Properties that return an of related objects. - 返回的值的属性的相关对象，如下所示的以下示例`SalesOrderDetail`类型。Properties that return the value of the of a related object, as in the following example from the `SalesOrderDetail` type.

MemberSignature.Value: public EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute (string relationshipNamespaceName, string relationshipName, string targetRoleName);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string relationshipNamespaceName, string relationshipName, string targetRoleName) cil managed
Public Sub New (relationshipNamespaceName As String, relationshipName As String, targetRoleName As String)
public: EdmRelationshipNavigationPropertyAttribute(System::String ^ relationshipNamespaceName, System::String ^ relationshipName, System::String ^ targetRoleName);

param.name: relationshipNamespaceName
param.span: 关系属性的命名空间名称。

span.span: The namespace name of the relationship property.

param.name: relationshipName
param.span: 关系名称不由命名空间限定。

span.span: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.

param.name: targetRoleName
param.span: 关系另一端的角色名称。

span.span: The role name at the other end of the relationship.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系名称不应包含命名空间。The relationship name should not contain a namespace. 如果你添加命名空间置于关系名称，例如*MyNamespace*。*MyRelationship*，将会出错。If you add the namespace to the relationship name, for example '*MyNamespace*.*MyRelationship*', an error will occur.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipName As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取非限定的关系名称。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关系名称不由命名空间限定。The relationship name is not namespace qualified. 关系的名称由指定`Name`属性`Association`概念模型中定义此关系的元素。The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RelationshipNamespaceName As String
public: property System::String ^ RelationshipNamespaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 导航属性的命名空间名称。

span.span: The namespace name of the navigation property.
A that is the namespace name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定关系的命名空间`Namespace`属性`Schema`包含概念模型中定义此关系的关联的元素。The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetRoleName As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetRoleName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取关系另一端的角色名称。

span.span: Gets the role name at the other end of the relationship.

value.span: 目标角色名称由在概念模型中定义此关系的关联中另一 元素的 特性指定。

span.span: The target role name is specified by the attribute of the other element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.

value.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。
